name: Easy Content Protector
author: plugindeveloper

sections.description:
Simple plugin to prevent copy content.
Features of this plugin
– Disable right click(contextmenu) and you can display your message when user press right click.
– Disable cut and you can display your message when user press control + x
– Disable copy and you can display your message when user press control + c
– Disable paste and you can display your message when user press control + v
– Disable inspect element and you can display your message when user press control + shift + i or F12
– Disable view source and you can display your message when user press control + u
sections.installation:
Direct from Dashbaord:

  • Please go to your website Dashboard
  • Plugins and Add new
  • Search for Easy Content Protector
  • Install it and activate it.

Manually Installation:

  • Please go to https://wordpress.org/plugins/easy-content-protector/
  • Download Zip file from there
  • Please go to your website Dashboard
  • Plugins and Add new
  • Uplaod zip file there
  • Install it and activate it.
sections.faq:
How can I disable copying our article from website?

Simply go to Dashboard >> Settings >> Content Protector >> You can check copy, paste, cut option to prevent copying

Can I remove message on copy, cut, paste, inspect elements, view source?

Yes, Simply when you clear the message field text it will hide message on frontend.

Can I disable right click(Context Menu) on website?

Yes you can disable it from Dashboard >> Settings >> Content Protector >> Disable Right Click(Checked if unchecked to disable)

What if I found a bug?

Simply Send email to our development team plugindeveloperofficial@gmail.com. We will fix it as soon as possible.
